results.overview: Chloe, a teenager who is confined to a wheelchair, is homeschooled by her mother, Diane. Chloe soon becomes suspicious of her mother and begins to suspect that she may be harboring a dark secret.
results.title: Run

results.overview: Three detectives become embroiled in a tense struggle after a tragic accident that leaves a child in critical condition. One is guilty of a crime, one will try to cover it up, and the other attempts to expose it. How far will these men go to disguise and unravel the truth?
results.title: Felony

results.overview: Two friends hit the road to Buenos Aires aboard an orange Opala 72, with a mission: be with as many women as possible. This is all a plan to wash the honor of "Caco", a man who found his girlfriend in bed with an Argentine.
results.title: El Revenge

results.overview: While the original parodied slasher flicks like Scream, Keenen Ivory Wayans's sequel to Scary Movie takes comedic aim at haunted house movies. A group of students visit a mansion called "Hell House," and murderous high jinks ensue.
results.title: Scary Movie 2

results.overview: Sneaking out. Hooking up. Melting down. The cast and crew of a blockbuster action franchise attempt to shoot a sequel while quarantining at a posh hotel.
results.title: The Bubble

results.overview: A middle-aged man calls into question his life choices and his own morals after a flirtation with a teenage girl at the beach.
results.title: Danyka

results.overview: College freshman Abby tries to distance herself from her dark past while resisting her attraction to bad boy Travis.
results.title: Beautiful Disaster

results.overview: A couple and their young son leave their urban life in Copenhagen and move to an isolated forest in Sweden, hoping to reignite the spark in their relationship.
results.title: Superposition

results.overview: Dispatched to a small Italian town to await further orders, assassin Jack embarks on a double life that may be more relaxing than is good for him.
results.title: The American

results.overview: Marco, a television journalist, reads "red lies" on his teletext system in order to gather material on the homosexual world for a story he's working on.  Unfortunately, he is implicated in a series of murders in which the victims are all gay.  Marco becomes a suspect and is forced to investigate the crimes himself in order to prove his innocence.
results.title: The Final Scoop

results.overview: A soldier-turned-high school teacher uses unusual methods to reach to a class of poor students, while dealing with a greedy entrepreneur and his gang of fighters as well as the government.
results.title: Big Brother

results.overview: Eric Desmond, a committed environmentalist, is accidentally involved in the transfer of Ben Corbett, a ruthless killer, from an isolated Alaskan village, along a long route, to civilization; but the prisoner is determined to escape at any cost.
results.title: Arctic Blue

results.original_title: For All - O Trampolim da Vitória
results.overview: 1943, World War II. The northeastern coast of Brazil is an strategic region for the Allies. Giancarlo, an Italian immigrant married to a Brazilian woman, lives nearby the Parnamirin Field, the largest military base built by the USA outside of their territory. In this new base, Brazilian recruits who speak English suddenly find themselves reaching privileged positions.
results.title: For All - O Trampolim da Vitória

results.overview: Rich, bisexual Thomas makes his way through a swath of lovers of both sexes in Paris. His parents have died, and he doesn't have to work to earn a living, so his days are bacchanalia-filled affairs that run into each other in a hazy bliss. The only one capable of eking out genuine affection from him is his neighbor, Caroline. When she dies and leaves her son in his care, Thomas learns the joys of commitment and selflessness.
results.title: To the Extreme

results.overview: In an attempt to rectify their criminal past, a once successful Hollywood starlet, turn prostitute, and a petty, misogynistic thief, set out together to solve a high profile child abduction case in San Francisco.
results.title: Wolf Mother

results.overview: Majestic mountains, a still lake and venomous betrayals engulf a married couple attempting to celebrate their first anniversary.
results.title: What Keeps You Alive

results.overview: Llewelyn Moss stumbles upon dead bodies, $2 million and a hoard of heroin in a Texas desert, but methodical killer Anton Chigurh comes looking for it, with local sheriff Ed Tom Bell hot on his trail. The roles of prey and predator blur as the violent pursuit of money and justice collide.
results.title: No Country for Old Men

results.overview: Among gunshots and boleros, a passionate relationship flourishes between a lonely transvestite and a young guerrilla during the Pinochet dictatorship.
results.title: My Tender Matador

results.overview: An awkward teenager hopelessly in love with her older sister's boyfriend tries to make him notice her.
results.title: The Patsy

results.overview: A social worker assigned to the care of the daughter of a single mother intervenes when the dad returns from prison and lures them into a life of crime.
results.title: The Gateway
